## Theme.setStartHats() method

Configure a theme's start hats.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setStartHats(startHats: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  startHats | boolean | True if the theme enables start hats, false otherwise. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
